## Plane.(constructor)

Creates a Plane object according to the given floats a, b, c, d and the plane equation : ax + by + cz + d = 0

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(a: number, b: number, c: number, d: number);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  a | <code>number</code> | a component of the plane |
|  b | <code>number</code> | b component of the plane |
|  c | <code>number</code> | c component of the plane |
|  d | <code>number</code> | d component of the plane |
